sentences.en: A series of operations by a plastic surgeon helped reconstruct his scalp and redistribute his hair.
sentences.cn: 一连串行动,由一名整形外科医生帮助重建他的头皮和散布自己的头发.

sentences.en: Controls were used to redistribute or redirect resources.
sentences.cn: 采用了管控措施来重新分配资源或改变其流向。

sentences.en: Freedom 2: the freedom to redistribute copies of the program when you wish.
sentences.cn: 第2条自由: 随意重发布程序副本的自由.

sentences.en: GPL would give the client the right to redistribute your version.
sentences.cn: GPL给予客户再次分发你的版本的权力.

sentences.en: He intends to redistribute income from the middle class to poorer paid employees and pensioners.
sentences.cn: 他意图把中产阶级到低薪雇员和退休人员的收入做重新分配.

sentences.en: In - memory could also redistribute the cards in the computer industry.
sentences.cn: 基于 内存的数据系统技术还可以将计算机工业重新洗牌.

sentences.en: They aim to redistribute income from the rich to the poor.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标是把富人的收入重新分配给穷人.

sentences.en: This program may be used freely, and you are welcome redistribute it under certain conditions.
sentences.cn: 可以免费使用本程序, 并且在肯定的条件下面再分配它.

sentences.en: To redistribute profits nationally so as to minimize taxes is certain to get particular partner.
sentences.cn: 通过在全国范围内重新分配利润,以便使纳税减至最低限度,这必然会使公司同这个特殊的合伙人陷入矛盾纠纷之中.

sentences.en: Various XML formats are making content easier to aggregate and redistribute.
sentences.cn: 各种XML格式使内容更容易集中和重新分发.

sentences.en: We believe you can redistribute this money in a way that's equitable to take care of the poor of the inner city.
sentences.cn: 我们相信你能够重新分配这笔钱，以公平合理地照顾市中心的贫民。

sentences.en: Wealth was redistributed more equitably among society.
sentences.cn: 财富在社会上被更公平地重新分配。

trans.tran_en: to give something to each member of a group so that it is divided up in a different way from before
